710778f-b.text:
(1)
Twelfth Ave., north from, but not including West 47th Street. View shows the process of erection of the Express Vehioular Highway.
NEG ~ 3EE  May 21, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The sawe, bot north frow West 48th Street.
EG ~3732  May 21, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same as No. 1, showing a closer view.
May 21, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.

710779f-b.text:
Twelfth Avenue, east side, north from and across W. 47th Street, showing demolition in progress for the widening of this thoroughfare. The 4 story stable seen in No. 633 W. 47th Street. North of same is the former Hardman, Peck and Co. factory on
08th Street.
Accompaning this photostat is a nemative print.
March 20, 1935.
Views 1a nd 2
P. L. Sperr
